mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.fund_id AS "fundId", a.org_id AS "orgId", a.dispindex AS "dispindex", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM ts_fund_org_index a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC

SELECT
FROM ts_fund_org_index a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ts_fund_org_index( fund_id, org_id, dispindex, create_date, update_date ) VALUES ( #{fundId}, #{orgId}, #{dispindex}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate} )
